General.Name: Guangdong Topstar Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Topstar Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of industrial robots in China. The company offers injection molding machines; injection robots; auxiliary equipment; CNC machines; and industrial robots, including six-axis multi-joint robots, SCARA robots, parallel robots, and cartesian coordinate robots. It also provides manipulators and other intelligent equipment; hardware mold machinery, automation equipment and automatic feeding, mixing and metering, dehumidification and drying, crushing and recycling and other plastic machinery and equipment, refrigeration equipment, etc.; automation; control system software and hardware; import and export of goods and technology; technology development in the field of rapid prototyping, research and development, production, processing and sales of rubber products and plastic products, such as printing equipment and printing equipment consumables; and dust-free, sterile purification systems, equipment and peripheral mechanical and electrical, instrumentation and control products, as well as mechanical and electrical installation engineering, air purification engineering, piping engineering, container installation engineering design, construction, and consulting service. Guangdong Topstar Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Dongguan, China.

4.Name: Ms. Tianshu  Kong
4.Title: VP & Sec. of the Board of Directors
